lines.text:
[as August starts to leave the room]
Where are you going?
I'm a detective. I'm going out to detect.
A detective. That's what I want to be when I grow up.
He's a good cop, Jack. If you take him off this case, you might destroy him.
We're all good cops, Frank. It's just that some of us have learned to bend with the wind.
Yeah, who knows. Maybe for a man that just shows a lack of spine.
